result.html: Abair amhránSing a song!
result.ponchtml: Abair aṁránSing a song!

result.eng: I only sing in the house (at home).
result.ga: Ní chasaim ach amháin sa mbaile
result.orig: Ní chasaim ach amháin sa mbaile
result.html: Ní chasaim ach amháin sa mbaileI only sing in the house (at home).
result.ponchtml: Ní ċasaim aċ aṁáin sa mbaileI only sing in the house (at home).

result.eng: I sing a song or two.
result.html: Casaim amhrán nó dhóI sing a song or two.
result.ponchtml: Casaim aṁrán nó ḋóI sing a song or two.

result.eng: I sing in church on Sundays.
result.ga: Canaim sa séipéal ar an Domhnach
result.orig: Canaim sa séipéal ar an Domhnach
result.html: Canaim sa séipéal ar an DomhnachI sing in church on Sundays.
result.ponchtml: Canaim sa séipéal ar an DoṁnaċI sing in church on Sundays.

result.ga: Is maith liom bheith ag canadh
result.orig: Is maith liom bheith ag canadh
result.html: Is maith liom bheith ag canadhI like to sing.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom ḃeiṫ ag canaḋI like to sing.
